Article.ArticleTitle: SARS-CoV-2 pneumonia-receptor binding and lung immunopathology: a narrative review.

AbstractText: The current pandemic of COVID-19 caused thousands of deaths and healthcare professionals struggle to properly manage infected patients. This review summarizes information about SARS-CoV-2 receptor binding dynamics and intricacies, lung autopsy findings, immune response patterns, evidence-based explanations for the immune response, and COVID-19-associated hypercoagulability.
